{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Seagate |model=Wireless Plus |revision=(STCK1000200) |upc=10763649045005 |ean=7636490043550 |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=mobile NAS |fcc_id=ZC9001AYBA2 |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=AM3703CUS |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=AzureWave AW-NH630 |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags=battery, portable, |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Seagate Wireless Plus |default_ssid_regex=^Seagate Wireless Plus$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:10:75 |oui_eth=00:10:75 }} '''Compact Mobile Hard Drive with built-in N150 Wireless and Media Server''' :[http://www.seagate.com/external-hard-drives/portable-hard-drives/wireless/wireless-plus/ Product page]
* USB 3.0 client * 1 TB storage * ~10 hours battery? - Li-ion, 3.7V, 2900 mAh * 1T1R N150 [http://www.azurewave.com/product_AW-NH630_1.asp AzureWave AW-NH630] * Hard drive: Samsung ST1000LM024 * Linux-2.6.32
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/32017-seagate-wireless-plus-reviewed ''Seagate Wireless Plus'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.hackseagatesatellite.com/wordpress/2013/01/29/new-seagate-wireless-plus-teardown/ ''Teardown'' on '''HackSeagateSatellite''']
See also [[Seagate GoFlex Satellite]]..
